metadata.Title: CVE-2013-0312 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
389 Directory Server before 1.3.0.4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a zero length LDAP control sequence.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-0312` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

389-ds - 1.3.0.3-1ubuntu1
389-ds-base - 1.3.0.3-1ubuntu1
389-ds-base-libs - 1.3.0.3-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.0.3-1ubuntu1').
